section.name: Applications
section.p: The source distribution includes to demonstrate most of the functionalities of the toolkit:

ul.li: Taglib and reverse proxy: esigate-master and esigate-provider applications
Aggregator: esigate-aggregator, esigate-aggregated1 and esigate-aggregated2 applications
Aggregator with CAS SSO: esigate-cas, esigate-casified-aggregator, esigate-casified-aggregated1 and esigate-casified-aggregated2 applications

section.name: Building
section.p: To build the applications, use clean and build Ant tasks
Built webapps are located under bin/webapps folder and can be deployed on a servlet container
